name: Administrative Cost Grants for Indian Schools
objective: To provide grants to tribes and tribal organizations operating schools for the purpose of paying administrative and indirect costs.
applicant_types: Native American Organizations (includes Indian groups, cooperatives, corporations, partnerships, associations)

results.description: No Current Data Available. No Information Available.
Indian Affairs did not require use of this CFDA code in FY2020.
Indian Affairs  issued 72 new awards and modifications to existing awards to 71 recipients.
Awards 5 grants to entities to complete the goals and objectives of the program.
This award funded 86 programs for cultural and language enhancement, teacher and counselor salary, safe amd secure schools, transportation.

authorizations.text: Indian Self-Determination and Education Assistance Act, Public Law 93-638, as amended, 25 U.S.C. 450 et seq.; Indian Education Amendments of 1978, Public Law 95-561, 25 U.S.C. 2001 et seq.; Tribally Controlled Schools Act, 25 U.S.C. 2501 et seq.
